name: Belmont Beaut
description:
Strolling down Belmont street in London during dreary autumn weather with this top is sure to brighten your day. The lovely button up blouse has the most unique collar fastened together with a tie. The unforgettable flutter sleeves adds a one-of-a-kind flare when paird with our Audrey skirt.

100% Poly
Fabric does not provide stretch.
22.5” length from top of shoulder
32” bust
Measurements taken from a size small
Imported

name: Polka Dot Dreams
description:
This sweater is sure to be a staple in your fall wardrobe. The simple emerald sweater with sewn white polka dots is comfy for an every day look-- dress is up with pearls and a skirt or down with jeans and boots! 

60% Cotton, 40% Poly
23” length from top of shoulder
32” bust
Measurements taken from a size small
Sweater is loose fitted.
Imported

name: Double Shot Date
description:
This mocha inspired dress is perfect for a date at your favourite local coffee shop alongside a double shot of espresso and cutesy latte art. The black peter pan collar adds class and a jolt to the past with the elegant black lace sleeves. Paired with out black tights, you are ready for a night out this fall.

100% Poly
33” length from top of shoulder
32” bust
Measurements taken from a size small
No lining.
Imported


Model: Emma H.
"I love the vintage feel of the cut and the collar - the lace sleeves  add an unexpected and pretty detail, which is fun. The colors are perfect for fall!"

name: Autumn Sunset
description:
Autumn Sunset will capture your love for fall with the delicate rust color paired with suede contrast and elbow length sleeves. The unique dress is topped off with the classic peter pan collar to bring out your vintage love and fastened in the back with a keyhole button. The dress has an elastic waist for stretch and the skirt is fully lined.

100% Poly Contrast
34” length from top of shoulder
32” bust
Measurements taken from a size small
Imported

name: Downton Daybreak by Dear Creatures
description:
This casual and lovely sweater top accents the every day girl. You are sure to love the set of buttons leading to the peter pan collar. The capped rust sleeves give a dainty vibe as you walk through the fall leaves.

100% Cotton
23” length from top of shoulder
32” bust
Measurements taken from a size small
Imported

name: Vintage Inspiration
description: WAS: $24.99 NOW: $19.99 This black chiffon front and contrast rayon back quarter sleeve top features an ivory vintage inspired crochet lace collar. The rounded top gives a flattering presence and is loose fitted for comfort. For a charming everyday look, pair this with countless skirts or an elegant pant. 100% Polyester 94% Rayon 6% Spandex 20" length from top of shoulder 32" bust Measurements taken from a size small

name: British Brunch
description:
WAS: $42.99  NOW: $21.50

This lovely light blue top features an ivory peter pan collar and sheer fabric leading to the bust. The floral pattern has hints of pink and green to compliment the blue. Your favorite part of this top is definitely the cutesy floral buttons beneath the collar. And we can't forget the vintage buttoned key hole featured on the back. Your British tea and crumpets are waiting alongside your best friends.


100% Polyester
Loose Fitted
Imported

25" length from top of shoulder
32" bust

All measurements taken from a size small

name: Sunday Girl
description: 100% Cotton Fabric provides stretch. Back keyhole with button closure. Size: Small Length: 22.5 Medium Length: 23 Large Length: 23.5 **TRY THIS!** Pair this top with our essential black skirt as pictured in the second photo!

name: Roman Holiday Dress
description: Inspired by the 1953 Audrey Hepburn flick, Roman Holiday, this dress features a scooped back and neck line and nautical stripes to meet an elegant skirt pulled together with a leather brown belt. Pair this dress with tights and oxfords for a stylish fall bike ride with your best friend. The skirt is fully lined. Top provides stretch. 100% Cotton 34” length from top of shoulder 32” bust Measurements taken from a size small

name: It's Jess! by Dear Creatures
description: WAS: $44.99 NOW:$ 32.00 One of our very favourite brands and top. And not to mention, one of Zooey Deschanel's favourites as well. It's Jess features shades of taupe stripes and a lovely tie along with detailed buttons and capped sleeves. If you can't tell, we were very inspired by Zooey and had to bring you this top as well. See Zooey wearing the same top below: Stripes: 100% Cotton Solid: 69% Rayon, 31% Poly Imported 25” length from top of shoulder 32” bust Measurements taken from a size small
